analysis.summary: NDA between YOOBROO, INC. and TONY LIU requires signature collection from the recipient (TONY LIU) with their signature and address, effective date 2025-06-30.
insights: Document involves two parties with YOOBROO, INC. as the disclosing party and TONY LIU as the recipient
Only recipient signature and address are listed as requirements, suggesting YOOBROO, INC. may pre-sign or sign after recipient
Effective date is set for 2025-06-30, which is in the future relative to current date 2025-09-25
Standard NDA structure with typical recipient authentication requirements
recommendations: Execute sequential signing with TONY LIU signing first as recipient, then YOOBROO, INC. as disclosing party
Collect from TONY LIU: full legal signature, complete mailing address, and signature date
Collect from YOOBROO, INC.: authorized signatory name, title, signature, and company address if not pre-filled
Verify effective date alignment - consider if 2025-06-30 should be signature date or a specific future effective date
Include witness signatures or notarization if required by jurisdiction or company policy
